title: doblezero

content: Hello everybody today we have 6 very nice coins, 2 physical silver and copper dogecoins +.3 penny bitcoin coins+ 1 advertising poker chip created by MrCryptHODL, signedTickets:1 - Timelord20672 - MrCryptHodl3 - Frank AlpenCoin4 - PreciousMetapsICT5 - Bitbuddy606 - Agrawas7 - ZipReg8 - Mr.Coin.Shop9 - aoluain0 - YodasRedRocketa - Timelord2067b - aoluainc - Suzuki Mattd - Agrawase - ZipReg f -  Brlgold777  Information Price Per Ticket:  Ticket Limit: There is no limit, you can buy whatever you want Shipping:  Shipping costs includedPayment BTC:   Payment  lightning network BTC:    How To Play1. choose one or more available slots2. PM or post a reply with your pick(s) + the txID of your transaction. 3. once all tickets are paid we'll select a block number. 4. The last character in the hash of that block will decide the winner! I hope you like it, good luck to everyone who wants to participate!

comments.body: I'll take letter "a" and number "1" please.I'd like to pay via Lightning if that's okay?Thanks.

comments.author: doblezero
comments.body: MrCryptHodl, I have been following the package for more than 1 month and in the end you did not pick it up from customs.I told him many times that he was going to ask for the package, in his country there are always problems with mail packages.Today I looked at the tracking number and my surprise is that October 5 marks the return process.then it is supposed to be returned to me and I will have to pay postage again and go back to the post office.I will inform you if they return it to me.get in contact with me.
